title: S3 Ep29: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 16 – Swamplands
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 16 – Swamplands
description:
November 15, 2018 / Jon Cryer hosts this week’s addendum with Susan Simpson and Colin Miller as they continue to discuss the Dennis Perry case. [Image: Photograph taken from the firebreak between Rising Daughter and Spring Bluff, on land formerly owned by the lead investigator in the reopened investigation.]

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Squarespace, Framebridge, FabFitFun, and Zulily.
